description.value: Choose two of the following formulas: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Acid Flask (Lesser)]{Acid Flask (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Alchemist's Fire (Lesser)]{Alchemist's Fire (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Bottled Lightning (Lesser)]{Bottled Lightning (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Frost Vial (Lesser)]{Frost Vial (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser)]{Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Thunderstone (Lesser)]{Thunderstone (Lesser)}.
